Reviews.Title: Not recomended
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I using this with VideoSeccu 50ft black cable, which is very thin, sensetivity of microphone is too high (which is not a bad thing), but all microphones i used have permanent constant clicking noise.Audio quality is on the low end, but you can hear conversations around the cameras, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: very sensitive. my customers love it when i install these. picks up everything!
Reviews.Author: jbf24
Reviews.Content: I have installed these lots of different places and the audio is very good.very sensitive. Customers can hear just about everything!

ProductInfo.Features:
Collect audio evidence as important as capturing video evidence
A combined power and audio cable are included with the microphone
Preamplifier used to increase a microphone's low output voltage to a stronger usable level
Built in on board IC preamp, low noise, high gain and auto level adjustment
Pick up every sound with the super high gain micro audio system
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack Audio Pickup Device Tiny Spy Mini Mic Microphones for CCTV Home Surveillance Security Camera WF8
